common.entity

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.entity.Request
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An object that created to transfer data from client application to the server. Server application processes client's requests by using the types in Request class. Class implements Serializable
    Author:
    shays
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
